title: Comparative Experimental Conditions Education for Improving Online Public Speaking Skills

context.prior_knowledge: Basic presentation skills and public speaking experience
context.additional_context: Provision of personalized learner feedback and comparative research across six experimental conditions (video lectures, real-time chat, recorded presentations, peer evaluation, AI analysis, blended mode)

learning_goals: Students can acquire public speaking skills under six experimental conditions and compare effectiveness across conditions to select optimal methods
Students can produce and present persuasive speeches three or more times using techniques that implement instructor presence and peer interaction in online environments
Students can improve speech content through peer feedback and AI analysis tools, achieving over 80% completion ratings in final presentations
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
